definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes

sentences.english: Keeping our military and using them when we have to, but not as our first instrument.
sentences.chinese: 保存軍事力量，不到非不得已絕不輕易動武。

sentences.english: I was impressed with his skills in the backhand smash, the forehand smash, and the drop shot.
sentences.chinese: 霍爾比較喜歡橫拍，因爲他可以輕易地用反手扣球。

sentences.english: From that day after, brocade the lotus then don't dare to easily privately get in touch with with route son again.
sentences.chinese: 從那日之後，錦蓮便不敢再輕易和小路子私下接觸。

sentences.english: Even before that, they treaded lightly in Basra.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在此以前，他們就輕易處理巴士拉。

sentences.english: Are we so uninformed about issues that we can be bought so easily?
sentences.chinese: 我們真的這麼愚昧無知到不知道自己可以被輕易收買？

sentences.english: Looking back on it, I wish we hadn t been given in so easily.
sentences.chinese: 回過頭來看，我希望我們沒有這樣輕易讓步。

sentences.english: The clients could easily swallow the cleaner wrasse while it is going about its job.
sentences.chinese: 清潔魚乾活的時候宿主可以輕易地把它吞下去。

sentences.english: In my mind in river"s lake, very easy."
In this story, Tom was easy to kill two of Chinese innocent safeguard.
sentences.chinese: 在裏面，阿湯哥輕易殺了，無辜的中國保安。

sentences.english: What do the devs want them to be "easily" killed by?
sentences.chinese: 惡魔們希望他們可以“輕易的”被殺死？

sentences.english: The placement of dollies on carrier pallets can also easily be carried out after the palletizing process.
sentences.chinese: 安置承運人托盤推車上也可以輕易地進行後碼垛進程。

sentences.english: I would wish not to be hasty in censuring anyone.
sentences.chinese: 我總希望不要輕易責難一個人。

sentences.english: However, I was still too careless with my units and lost my main troop too easily.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，我還是輕易的損失了的主力部隊。

sentences.english: With his defenses stripped, Windu was easily overpowered by Chancellor Palpatine.
sentences.chinese: 失去防禦力的溫杜被帕爾帕廷議長輕易擊敗。

sentences.english: It should be easy to see the history of an insurance policy.
sentences.chinese: 應該可以輕易地看到保險政策的歷史。

sentences.english: This but is her heartfelt words, afterward rarely being wine, easily and then vomited out.
sentences.chinese: 這卻是她的肺腑之言，難得是酒後，輕易便吐了出來。

definition: in no way/not in the least/absolutely not
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
